findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead, and increases gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: State variables that are initialized once in the constructor and not modified afterwards can be declared as immutable to save gas.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code is present in the contract, making it more difficult to understand and maintain, and increasing the size of the contract and deployment cost.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables that are configured on user-supplied input lack proper checks for zero values, leading to possible problems during contract execution.
